fixes.name: Price Type
fixes.dax_expression: SWITCH(SELECTEDVALUE('Price Type'[Display As]), "Open", 'stock_data+'[Price Open], "Close", 'stock_data+'[Price Close], "High", 'stock_data+'[Price High], BLANK())
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau CASE on a parameter to DAX SWITCH. Replaced the Tableau parameter reference with SELECTEDVALUE('Price Type'[Display As]) and converted column references to the 'stock_data+'[Column] format. Returns the corresponding price field or BLANK() if no match.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
